issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
If the user does not specify a keystore, we will always [fall back on our builtin keystore|https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/blob/981b9f8f61e58e0c74789e6db48ae8feb007b16a/android/cli/commands/_build.js#L1748-L1755].

To enforce security best practices we should require the user to specify a keystore for production builds.
fields.summary: Production builds should not use builtin keystore
